mapper.update:
update jenkins_trigger_authorization
APPLICANT = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION_TIME = #{applicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVER = #{approver,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROCESSING_TIME = #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jenkins_trigger_authorization set APPLICANT = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICATION_TIME = #{applicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVER = #{approver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROCESSING_TIME = #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEPART = #{depart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
